::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-8}

* Quantitative ecologist and software developer. I like to work on software and
data solutions that can solve environmental challenges and support research. 

* Over ten years of experience with the R programming language. I excel in using
data to uncover insights into systems, such as environmental effects on animal
behaviours and species distributions.

* My current focus is expanding my skill set by learning computer science
and different tech stacks, including Go, Typescript, React + Django +
PostgreSQL stack, and Ruby.
